tool_description: An API, bringing you the latest   news on climate change from around the world
name: Climate Change Update
title: Climate Change Update

api_list.name: Get Individual Climate Change  news from a particular source
api_list.description: Getting Climate Change news from a particular source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-update1.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-update1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-update1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-update1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news about climate change around the world.
